verses.verse: And the lot<WH1486> of the children<WH1121> of Joseph<WH3130> fell<WH3318> from Jordan<WH3383> by Jericho,<WH3405> to the water<WH4325> of Jericho<WH3405> on the east,<WH4217> to the wilderness<WH4057> that goes<WH5927> up from Jericho<WH3405> throughout mount<WH2022> Bethel,<WH1008>
And goes<WH3318> out from Bethel<WH1008> to Luz,<WH3870> and passes<WH5674> along to the borders<WH1366> of Archi<WH757> to Ataroth,<WH5852>

And goes<WH3381> down<WH3381> westward<WH3220> to the coast<WH1366> of Japhleti,<WH3311> to the coast<WH1366> of Bethhoron<WH1032> the nether,<WH8481> and to Gezer;<WH1507> and the goings<WH8444> out thereof are at the sea.<WH3220>
So the children<WH1121> of Joseph,<WH3130> Manasseh<WH4519> and Ephraim,<WH669> took their inheritance.<WH5157>

And the border<WH1366> of the children<WH1121> of Ephraim<WH669> according to their families<WH4940> was thus: even the border<WH1366> of their inheritance<WH5159> on the east<WH4217> side was Atarothaddar,<WH5853> to Bethhoron<WH1032> the upper;<WH5945>

And the border<WH1366> went<WH3318> out toward the sea<WH3220> to Michmethah<WH4366> on the north<WH6828> side; and the border<WH1366> went<WH5437> about<WH5437> eastward<WH4217> to Taanathshiloh,<WH8387> and passed<WH5674> by it on the east<WH4217> to Janohah;<WH3239>
And it went<WH3381> down<WH3381> from Janohah<WH3239> to Ataroth,<WH5852> and to Naarath,<WH5292> and came<WH6293> to Jericho,<WH3405> and went<WH3318> out at Jordan.<WH3383>

The border<WH1366> went<WH3212> out from Tappuah<WH8599> westward<WH3220> to the river<WH5158> Kanah;<WH7071> and the goings<WH8444> out thereof were at the sea.<WH3220> This<WH2063> is the inheritance<WH5159> of the tribe<WH4294> of the children<WH1121> of Ephraim<WH669> by their families.<WH4940>

And the separate<WH3995> cities<WH5892> for the children<WH1121> of Ephraim<WH669> were among<WH8432> the inheritance<WH5159> of the children<WH1121> of Manasseh,<WH4519> all<WH3605> the cities<WH5892> with their villages.<WH2691>

And they drove<WH3423> not out the Canaanites<WH3669> that dwelled<WH3427> in Gezer:<WH1507> but the Canaanites<WH3669> dwell<WH3427> among<WH7130> the Ephraimites<WH669> to this<WH2088> day,<WH3117> and serve<WH5647> under tribute.<WH4522>
